name: Sootwing
description: The Sootwing is a small, winged creature known for its soot-covered wings and keen sense of smell. It has a proboscis for feeding and its body is designed for quick maneuvers in the air.
memorable: Its ability to create a blinding cloud of ash can significantly impair opponents, allowing for surprise attacks.
goals: To scout for dangers and ambush prey, utilizing its evasive flying capabilities.
relations: May be found accompanying larger beasts or used as a scout by cunning creatures.
environment: Favored in areas with low light and possibly near fires or soot.
strengths: Immunity to fire damage and ability to use the Sooty Wings ability to blind enemies.
weaknesses: Low hit points make it vulnerable to sustained damage; limited intelligence limits tactical capabilities.
attacks: Utilizes a proboscis for piercing damage and has a Sooty Wings ability that can blind multiple foes.
most_powerful_ability: Sooty Wings creates a cloud of ash that blinds and damages enemies within a radius.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, enabling it to see in dim light and darkness effectively.
skills: Proficient in stealth and perception, allowing it to blend into surroundings and notice threats.
additional_information: Antennae trait gives advantage on Perception checks relying on smell.
Moderate dexterity allows for stealthy movement and evasion.
Ineffective in social interactions due to low charisma.
Vulnerable to physical attacks due to low armor class.
Works well as a distraction in combat.
test_queries: small flying creature with fire resistance
stealthy beast that can blind enemies
quick beast with ash cloud ability
winged creature immune to fire damage
